alert.note: Alert for Lee; Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hawkins, eastern Lee, central Scott and southwestern Wise Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Big Stone Gap, or 14 miles east of Jonesville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Stone Gap, Church Hill, Mount Carmel, Duffield, Clinchport, Jasper, Okolona, Fort Blackmore, Dryden and Pattonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
